00070 #define __HALF_MAX_SIGNED(type) ((type)1 << (sizeof(type)*8-2))
00071 #define __MAX_SIGNED(type) (__HALF_MAX_SIGNED(type) - 1 + __HALF_MAX_SIGNED(type))
00072 #define __MIN_SIGNED(type) (-1 - __MAX_SIGNED(type))
00073 #define __MIN(type) ((type)-1 < 1?__MIN_SIGNED(type):(type)0)
00074 #define __MAX(type) ((type)~__MIN(type))
